Articles.Content:
Hi...

i've visit this forum often in a year so i decide to register to help and get help and all the sort of thinig who someone should say in a post like that ;-)

see ya in the forum...
Hello. Welcome to the forum. (And there is no officially approved way to spell "kerbalnauts." )
I would give you your first rep, but I repped too many people.

Well, glad to hear you'll be helping out! ...WRITE? I had to. (Left? I don't know)

Anyway, I'll look forward to seeing you around. Have a great time!
